contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 27, 1993 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-second-section
Introduction, Elegy and Caprice
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium - Tylorstown. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 4 bands competed.
March 2, 2015, 4:43 p.m. July 2, 2020, 9:54 p.m.
1 Rogerstone Band Adrian Hill
2 TATA Brass E. J. Clark
3 Tylorstown Band Kerry Bowden
4 Aberystwyth Silver Band Alan Phillips
